Gary Koala
Purchased two kitchen sinks paid in full, i waited over a month tried to call no answer email same fate. Hopefully I haven't lost my money
Business response on Sep 16, 2025 09:35 PM (AEST)
Hello Gary Sorry to hear about your experience. We've checked our system and can't find any order or emails under your name, so it's possible this may have been with another supplier. To help us investigate further, could you please forward a copy of your order confirmation or receipt to info@bathroomsalesdirect.com.au, so we can look into this urgently for you?
